definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to become rich by one's own efforts/self-made
Poverty is a stranger to industry. (idiom)
pinyin: qin2 lao2 bu4 yu2 kui4 fa2

sentences.english: Some called the artist brave and hardworking.
sentences.chinese: 有些所謂的藝術家勤勞勇敢的。

sentences.english: An honest, hard-working man is the salt of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 誠實而勤勞的人是社會的中堅分子。

sentences.english: As descendants of the early settlers， they were tolerant and hardworking.
sentences.chinese: 作爲早期移民的後裔，他們忍耐而勤勞。

sentences.english: Who is using the hard-working hands, as we have built a happy home?
sentences.chinese: 是誰用勤勞的雙手，爲我們營造一個溫馨的家園？

sentences.english: Sooner or later, the wave will come along and knock down what we have worked so hard to build up.
sentences.chinese: 浪濤遲早會襲來摧毀我們辛勤勞動所建造起來的一切。

sentences.english: The Chinese are industrious and brave.
They started working hard to build a new bridge.
sentences.chinese: 爲了修一座新橋，他們開始辛勤勞動。

sentences.english: Ella never complained about her work and did it diligently .
sentences.chinese: 艾拉從來沒有抱怨過，她只是勤勞地幹着自己的活。

sentences.english: Like bees work hard can enjoy the sweet life.
sentences.chinese: 象蜜蜂一樣勤勞工作才能享受蜜甜生活。

sentences.english: Chitty : I am an enemy of diligence, so i sympathize your experience.
sentences.chinese: 我是勤勞的敵人，我很同情你的遭遇。

sentences.english: The second school holds that ideas are the product of hard work and thoughtful concentration.
sentences.chinese: 另一個流派認爲，想法是辛勤勞動和凝神思考的產物。

sentences.english: My mother is hard-working . I love her very much .
sentences.chinese: 我的媽媽是一個勤勞的人，我非常愛她。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation is brave and hardworking.
sentences.chinese: 中華民族是勤勞勇敢的。

sentences.english: He works hard from morning till night. He is a hard worker.
sentences.chinese: 他從早到晚努力工作，他是個勤勞的人。

sentences.english: I like gardens too， but I do not like hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我也喜歡花園，但我卻不願意辛勤勞動。

sentences.english: We want people who are hardworking and amiable.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要既勤勞又和氣的人。

definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
to be dedicated to one's work/to respect one's work
